pages.text: An architect's best friend. It perfectly mirrors blocks placed and broken, but respects differentiating blocks.$(br2)Shift + Right Click to adjust its settings!

Requires Mechanical Crafters to create. Please refer to JEI for the recipe. $(li)Keep in mind the mirror entity is only visible to you and not your friends! $(li)It only keeps track of blocks placed and destroyed by the one who placed the mirror.
